name: The Adventures of Robin Hood
overview: A side-view action game in which you play Robin Hood, running about Sherwood Forest stealing treasure and shooting troops of the Sheriff with your trusty bow. If you are low on health, you can find and kiss Maid Marian, which will restore your life. Due to the programming approach, Robin Hood can climb anything that is brown on the screen (which is meant to be trees, but brown is used for other graphics as well).
